topics.title: Describe a pet or animal you like
topics.prompt: Talk about an animal or pet you like. Describe its appearance and why you like it.
topics.hint: 請用3~5句英文描述你喜歡的動物或寵物，可以說明牠的樣子和你喜歡牠的原因。
topics.sample: I like rabbits because they are soft and cute. They have long ears and a small nose. I enjoy watching them hop around in the garden. They make me feel happy and calm.

topics.title: Your daily routine at school
topics.prompt: Describe your typical day at school. What do you do in the morning and afternoon?
topics.hint: 描述你一天在學校的活動，包括上午和下午的時間，可以用簡單句子表達你的學校日常。
topics.sample: I usually wake up early and eat breakfast. I go to school and have lessons. After school, I play with my friends or study at home.

topics.title: How do you feel when you play with friends?
topics.prompt: Say how you feel when you play with your friends. Use words about emotions.
topics.hint: 用英文說你和朋友玩時的感覺，可以說開心、快樂或其他情緒，用3~4句描述。
topics.sample: I feel very happy when I play with my friends. We laugh and have fun together. Playing makes me forget about being tired.

topics.title: Imagine and describe a little lamb
topics.prompt: Imagine a little lamb and describe what it looks like and what it does.
topics.hint: 發揮想像力，用英文描述一隻小羊的樣子和行為，約3~5句。
topics.sample: A little lamb is very soft and white. It likes to run and jump in the grass. The lamb follows its mother everywhere. It is very gentle and cute.

topics.title: Explain why children should play outside
topics.prompt: Talk about why you think children should play outside every day.
topics.hint: 用3~4句英文說明孩子為什麼每天應該在外面玩，包含健康和快樂等理由。
topics.sample: Children should play outside because it keeps them healthy. Playing outside helps them make friends and enjoy nature. It also makes them feel happy and strong.

topics.title: Tell a short story about going to school
topics.prompt: Tell a short story about a time you went to school and something special happened.
topics.hint: 講一個你去學校時發生特別事情的小故事，用英文表達，約4~6句。
topics.sample: One day, I saw a cute dog on the way to school. It followed me for a while. I felt surprised and happy. It was a fun and memorable morning.

topics.title: Describe your favorite outdoor game
topics.prompt: Describe your favorite game to play outside. Explain the rules or what you like about it.
topics.hint: 用英文描述你最喜歡的戶外遊戲以及規則或喜歡的原因。
topics.sample: My favorite outdoor game is tag. One person is 'it' and tries to catch the others. I like this game because it is exciting and keeps me moving.

topics.title: Talk about the colors you see in nature
topics.prompt: Describe some colors you see when you are outside, like in a park or garden.
topics.hint: 描述你在戶外看到的顏色，例如公園或花園裡的顏色，3~5句英文。
topics.sample: In the park, I see green grass and colorful flowers. The sky is usually blue on sunny days. Sometimes, there are white clouds that look soft.

topics.title: Imagine being a child playing freely
topics.prompt: Imagine you are a child playing outside without any worries. Describe how you would feel and what you would do.
topics.hint: 想像自己是個無憂無慮的孩子，在戶外玩耍，說說感覺和活動。
topics.sample: I would feel very happy and free. I would run around and play games with my friends. I would laugh a lot and enjoy the fresh air.

topics.title: Describe the sounds you hear at school
topics.prompt: Describe different sounds you hear during a school day, like in class or playground.
topics.hint: 描述你在學校裡聽到的聲音，如課堂或操場，有幾句英文即可。
topics.sample: At school, I hear teachers talking and students reading aloud. Outside, children laugh and play games. Sometimes I hear birds singing near the windows.
